snippet: Chinese banks, used as a tool by Beijing, reported a stronger-than-expected 1.08 trillion renminbi, or about $170 billion, of new loans in June.
lead_paragraph: Chinese banks, used as a tool by Beijing, reported a stronger-than-expected 1.08 trillion renminbi, or about $170 billion, of new loans in June.

headline.main: China Presses Banks to Extend More Loans
headline.print_headline: China Presses Banks to Extend More Loans
